holidays.name: Chocolate-covered Anything Day
holidays.description: A deliciously indulgent day where you’re encouraged to dip and coat anything imaginable in chocolate — from fruits to pretzels to bacon! The only rule: if you can eat it, you can cover it in chocolate.
holidays.origin: Originally a fun internet food craze that turned into an annual celebration, encouraging culinary creativity and sweet tooth satisfaction in December’s chill.
holidays.funFact: Some adventurous chocolate-coated treats have included potato chips, chili peppers, and even fried chicken!

holidays.name: National Warm Fuzzy Day
holidays.description: Celebrate kindness by giving warm fuzzy feelings to those around you with compliments, hugs, or small acts of love. It’s a day dedicated to spreading emotional warmth during the winter month.
holidays.origin: Started by greeting card company Hallmark in the 1980s to promote heartfelt connections during the holiday season.
holidays.funFact: Giving a genuine compliment on Warm Fuzzy Day can boost serotonin levels—so you’re literally making someone happier!

holidays.name: Ugly Christmas Sweater Day
holidays.description: Pull out your most cringe-worthy, colorful, and bedazzled Christmas sweater and wear it proudly. It’s a day to embrace holiday tackiness with a pants-full of jingle bells.
holidays.origin: Popularized in the early 2000s as a fun social event and party theme, gaining traction to become an annual holiday tradition.
holidays.funFact: The first ugly Christmas sweater parties started as charity events, helping raise money through festive tackiness!

holidays.name: Bazaar Day
holidays.description: A quirky celebration encouraging people to create their own mini market or craft fair. It combines community spirit with entrepreneurial energy — perfect for handmade gifts and cocoa sales.
holidays.origin: Inspired by traditional winter bazaars in Europe, adapted into a day of local commerce and joyful bartering.
holidays.funFact: Many bazaars on this day feature not only crafts but also unusual holiday treats and quirky trinkets you won’t find anywhere else!
